title: Mark Scott faces a possible 17-year sentence for OneCoin money laundering
description: In a recent development, Mark Scott, a lawyer convicted of money laundering through the infamous OneCoin cryptocurrency scheme, is facing the possibility of a substantial prison sentence. The United States Attorney’s Office has recommended a minimum 17-year prison term, while Scott’s legal team proposed a considerably shorter five-year sentence.  This divergence in sentencing proposals underscores […]

title: Options trading for Bitcoin ETFs may begin by the end of February; the SEC acknowledges proposals
description: In a significant development for the cryptocurrency market, options trading for Bitcoin exchange-traded funds (ETFs) could potentially commence as early as the end of February, as confirmed by an analyst.  On January 19, the United States Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) officially acknowledged the proposals put forth by Nasdaq and the Cboe to introduce options […]

title: UK economy: Is the soft landing still in sight?
description: As we navigate through the choppy waters of economic forecasts and data releases, the UK’s economic landscape appears more like a rollercoaster than a serene glide. The much-anticipated soft landing of the UK economy, which seemed almost within reach, now faces fresh turbulence. With recent figures introducing a twist in the tale, we’re left wondering […]

title: Pastor dupes investors out of $1.3m in crypto-selling scam
description: The Denver-based pastor, who runs an online-only church called Victorious Grace Church, allegedly sold worthless INDXcoin crypto, and made away with a huge chunk of the proceeds.
